text: The Lincoln MKX, also called Lincoln Nautilus, is a middle-sized sport utility vehicle. It is sold and marketed under the Lincoln division of the Ford Motor Company. The MKX is a five-door crossover. The first generation MKX was produced from 2007â€“2015. The second generation is in production. Lincoln is phasing out its use of "MK" model names. Lincoln MKX adopted the Nautilus name. ==References== Category:2000s automobiles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles MKX Category:Sport utility vehicles
title: Lincoln MKX
